p: In the case of SHEO190-2.5, the total disappearance of the bands at 781, 946, and 2818 cm −1 was found, while the band at 812 cm −1 is given by out-of-plane C–H wagging vibrations, and the band recorded between 3200–3600 cm −1 provided by OH stretching vibration, increase in intensity. Regarding the p-cymene specific bands, these decreases in intensity, suggest that after 190 ºC, the main remaining component of essential oil is carvacrol.
